summary: A documentary on the life and films of director John Ford.
cast: Orson Welles|Clint Eastwood|Katharine Hepburn|Walter Hill|Maureen O'Hara|Martin Scorsese|Steven Spielberg|John Wayne|Ward Bond|Harry Carey|Jeffrey Hunter|Richard Widmark|Peter Bogdanovich|Harry Carey Jr.|Henry Fonda|John Ford|James Stewart
title: Directed by John Ford
